text: @SaraCarterDC @JennieSTaer As if China "paid" Cuomo to say it. And they might have. He has done a lot of things that made no sense until you follow the money. (put Covid19 patients back in nursing homes, withheld statistics on nursing home deaths under BS excuse, forbid use of HCQ/zinc. unnecessary deaths.
